name: 64 Floors
description:
64 Floors is a hardcore top down twin-stick shooter.

Battle your way through the floors of an evil skyscraper to make it to the top. Each floor is 64x64 pixels big, but still feature diverse gameplay and challenges.

This game is in early access, it is probable that many changes will be made before the full release. Currently, there are 8 levels in total, mostly meant for testing purposes. If you have any suggestions or criticism, or even drawn level ideas or new features, please feel free to post them in the comments below or contact my discord: Redfive11#1657
